item.title: About
item.description: This is a short personal website. No commercial interests, no warranty for anything written here. If you are interested in how the site is built: The pages are written in Markdown and the respective HTML website is automatically generated by a static site generator (Hugo) every time I push to github (using github actions). Everything is hosted at github pages and the domain is redirected there. There is a longer post giving more details in my collection of random notes.
